item.title: Bookdown and GitHub Pages
item.description: Today I finally got a bookdown book to appear properly in GitHub pages (well, perhaps I did this in the past, but I do not recall). The main gap was that I needed to add the following line output_dir: docs to the _bookdown.yml file. Of course, the GitHub repository and Pages needed to be set up as well to point to the docs subdirectory. Here were the helpful websites
